subject: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
full_text:
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

  File        : /*Bruce FB#12 files/32_WE JUMPED TOGETHER BRUCE.wav 
  Uploaded by : bhali333 <paranormalinvestigating@...> 
  Description : 32_WE JUMPED TOGETHER BRUCE.wav I was a paratrooper in the army and lost quite a few buddies 

You can access this file at the URL:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/%2ABruce%20FB%2312%20files/32_WE%20JUMPED%20TOGETHER%20BRUCE.wav 

To learn more about file sharing for your group, please visit:
http://help.yahoo.com/l/us/yahoo/groups/original/members/web/index.htmlfiles

Regards,

bhali333 <paranormalinvestigating@...>
